#summary This page contains the Rowboat Roadmap

= What's available today =
  * Google Android Eclair based Android for OMAP35xx/37xx, AM35x
  * SGX530 accelerated 3D graphics.
  * Validated on [OMAP3EVM], BeagleBoard and [AM3517EVM], including !PacketVideo ARM codecs, Web browsing, touchscreen, and more. See [http://code.google.com/p/rowboat/wiki/TestingAndroid this] wiki topic for other tests.
  * 2.6.32 kernel based on 
  * Synchronized with *DVSDK_3_00 3_00_02_44 *
  * [DSP] support (DSPLink, Codec Engine, DMAI, TIGStreamer) for Eclair

= Open items on Eclair (see above for status): =
 * OpenCore/OpenMax DMAI bindings
 * Integration of OMAP35xx/AM35x Display features, Video Input and Camera interfaces

= Froyo =

Plans for *Froyo* have not yet been finalized, but we will continue to work on the following: 
 * Keep everything synchronized with Google Android
 * Integrate latest updates and bugfixes
 * Expand supported platforms list
 * Try to achieve record performance and stability
